scripts.build: cd mgm-front && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.find:legacy: git ls-files "**/vercel.json" | xargs -I{} bash -lc 'echo --- {}; grep -nE "\b(builds|routes)\b" {} || true'; test -f now.json && echo 'tiene now.json' && true || true
scripts.find:file-runtime: git grep -nE 'export const config\s*=\s*\{\s*runtime' -- api || true
scripts.doctor:big: git diff --name-only main...HEAD | xargs -I{} bash -lc 'test -f {} && wc -c <{} || true' | awk '{sum+=$1} END {printf "Total bytes: %d\n", sum}'
scripts.doctor:ignored: git check-ignore -v dist build .next .cache coverage || true
